name: Bunny Dreams
description: Honey-Bun is a sleepy bunny who dreams of one day reaching the stars. Aid her in her adventure to climb past the misty clouds and meteors and toward the bright sparkling stars. However because Honey-Bun is so sleepy, she often becomes dazed leaving you helpless. With no control over when she falls asleep, you must try your best to take her up to the stars!
